div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvto die nouembris Anno quo supra

the said' day James Kintor grantit him to fre philp Dunbrek
of ane barrel of Salmond' acht to thome menyeis

The balye court of Abirdene haldin in the tolbutht the xvj day of
nouembre the yer forsaid'

The said' day Androw Culane balye complenyeit to the aldirman and balyeis
vpon' gilbert gareauche and Alexander gareauche that thai distrubulit him in
the execucion' of his office and thai said' personis putt tham in the aldirman
and ballies will quhilk action' the aldirman and balyeis continevit to
friday that next cumis

the samyn day murthou blak fand' William portar Souerte and law borrowis
that Androw branche salbe vnhurt and skathit for him bot as law will
and to entir one friday to ansuer to the said' Androw And' the said' Androw
fand' Alexander nachty law borrowis that the said' murtho salbe vnhurt for him
bot as law will
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die nouembris Anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman and ballies assignit friday the Secunde
day of Dece'Dece' overwrites 'noue'.mber the yer forsaid' next to cum to Dauid Kintor to
ansuer to the borghe strekit vppon him be Archebald Rate forspekar
to William Kymdy that the saide Dauid aucht to mak compte
rekning and pament of the malis of this last mertymes terme bigane
of ane croft callit the boulcroft belangand' to the said' Williame
or ellis to restoire the corne agane and wrangis and he do it nocht
et cetera

the said' day It was fundin be the aldirman and the consal present for
the tyme that gilbert of gareauche and Alexander gareauche sal cum one sonday
that next cumis one sonday in tyme of the hie mes' the said' gilbert haffand'
j li' of wax with him and offir thar to the haly blud' mes' Ande ask the
aldirman and Androu Culan and the ballieis forgevinnis for the offens' done
be tham And' gyf ony of thame offendis till ony officiar' of the
court in tyme to cum and beis conuikit tharof sal pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes' werk vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xviij die nouembris
Anno quo supra

the said' day diuers' of the consale and communite present for the tyme grantit
the Seill of caus' to ane testimoniale producit be sere Jonhne ruthirfurd'
of fyfty markis acht to him be the haill tone eftir the decret of certan
Auditoris suorne vpon' his compt as In the samyn mair' fullely is contenit

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxviij die nouembris
anno quo supra

the saide day the court wardit schew for law and gaf for dome
that Jhone Colison thomas prat and murthow glenmaluyn has falyeit
in thar preyf that thai tuk to preyf that sere Jhon' ruthirfurd'
hed' gevin thame ane mast and a ray Ande the said' sere Jhone
ruthirfurd' is cumin to his clame and call ande recouerit the saide
mast and ray quhilkis the ballieis chargit thame to pay within terme
of law

the said' day Jhone blak follouit Jonhne of murray for compt rekning
and pament of xxxjxx skinnis that he Intromettit with of his and sauld' quhilkis
the saide Jhone denyit and for falt of assis' the balyeis contenevit it to friday

Eodem die Andreas lammyntone legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio
super ipsum per Johannem lammyntone porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab
eo summe xxxiij s' et iiij d' non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dun
brek seriando ad capiendum districtum ab eodem andrea et eundem sibi ad
plegium dimitti si petatur et ipsum premunire hodie ad quindenam
tanquam quarto die huius processus

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio penultimo die nouembris
anno quo supra

the samyn day Alexander ranison' eldar in Amerciament of the court be
his tounge graunt for the wranguis' trubulance of Sandy
Wilson' and to Amend' as law wile and forber' in tym tocum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio secundo die Decembris
Anno quo supra

The said' day the borghe strekit be archebald' rate vppon'
Dauid' Kintor anent the martimes maile of ane croft belang
and' to Williame Kymdy with consent of batht the partiis is
continevit to the law day eftir this next yule in hoipe of
concord' without preiudice of party

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio / octauo
die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

the saide day the court wardit schew for law and gaf for
dome that Williame scherar has falyet in his preyf that he
tuk to preif that he was compellit and constrenyet of force to mak
the obligacion to Jhone Stronoche of fiwe rinsche guthtlingis
producit in Jugement be sere Jonhne stirueling procurator for the saide
Jonhne Ande the saide procurator William was condempnit in the said'
some eftir the tenor' of his obligacion maide to the saide Jonhne stronoche
tharapon' obefore

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas prat forspekar
that Sandy stabillar sal content and pay to Alexander glenny and thomas
henrisone samekile as thai can preyf of thar geir and siluer was
takin away fra thame out of his hous'

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xij die
Decembris Anno quo supra

the saide day it was deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman and consal present
for the tyme that Thomas mar Androw branche and Androw Culane eldar
ballieis for the tyme that Intromettit with jc li' of our Souerane lordis taxt
sal content and pay xxxvj li' and x s' restand' of the saide taxt and fre the
towne tharof in continent and remane within the tolbutht quhil the saide some
be pait Ilkan mane for his parte eftir the tenor of thar billis gevin to tham
tharapon'

the saide day the aldirman and ballies In presence of sere Stewin lokert
of clegharne knicht grantit thame to haue resauit be the handis of Androw
branche compt rekning and pament of his part of our Souerane lordis
taxt of jc li' samekile as he Intromettit with and was in his bill of the
quhilkis thai in the nayme of the towne helde thame wele content
and pait Ande dischargis the saide Androw his ayris executoris ande
assignez' In the nayme of the said' burghe now and foreuere

The saide day thomas Jamesone officiar at commawnd' of the aldirman
and ballieis chargit be his wande thomas mar to remane within
the tolbutht quhile he rede and pait his parte of the jc li' of our
Souerane lordis taxte samekile as he Intromettit with and was gevin'
him in billis

the samyn day the aldirman ballieis and diuers' of the Consale present for
the tyme assignit the law day next eftir yule to gif ansuer
to sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' or his procuratouris of the pament of lti markis
decretit to him be the Auditouris of his cowrt with awys' of the communite
quhilkis wald' be present the saide day

the saide day the court wardit schew for law and gaf for dome
that Jonhne of lammyntone is cumin to his clame and call of xxxiij
s' and iiij d' vpon' Androw lammynton' Ande the saide Androw was
in Amerciament of this court in falt of apperance and aucht to pay the
saide Some to the said' Jonhne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvij die Decembris Anno quo supra

the saide day sere Stheuin lokert of cligharne knicht deliuerit
ane letter of wardinge to Jonhne menyes ane of the balyeis
of abirdene and chargit him to deliuer the saide letter to Jonhne
Culane aldirman of the said' burghe alssone as he mycht
comprehende him and charge him to Entir his persone in blaknes'
in warde within aucht dais eftir the fatht of the said' letter
or ellis to bringe the remanent and rest of the jc li' of our Souerane
lordis taxt and x li' of the vnlaw of the cheker of this yer bigane
to our Souerane lordis thesaurar' or comptrollar the Sext day
of februar next to Cum

the samyn day sere Sthevin lokert of cligharne knicht seref to
our Souerane lorde in that parte releuit and dischargit Androw
Culane yongar and Jonhne menyeis tua of the ballieis of thar war
dinge becaus' of thar diligence and labour done in the vpgathtringe
of the kingis taxte vpon' the quhilkis the saide Jonhne tuk Instrument
befor thir witnes Robert blinsele thomas prat Androw branche
and Androw fyf with vthir diuers'

the saide day sere Sthevin lokert grantit him resavit be the handis
of androw culane yongar and Jhone menyes ij of the balyeis of
the said' burghe' fifty pundis of the jc li' of the kingis taxt

the saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
that of the ix li' of the kingis taxt restand' vnpait thar is iij li' and xi s' that
Androw culan eldar sal ansuer' for Ande thomas mar' and the saide
Androw sal fre the towne of the remanent of the said' ix li' and thai
sal compt and rekning togiddir befor''for'' overwrites 'ene?'. suorne personis and euere
man gif vthir that resone will Ande gif thar be ony thingis
avand' be ony nichtbour of the towne of the said' taxt the
officiaris sal furyn thame to pament and do tham Justice

the sevint day of Januar the yer forsaid' Jonhne menyeis ane of the
ballieis passit to distrenye lindesay herraldez gudis to mak pament
to Dauid menyeis eldar eftir the tenor' of the akis maid obefor Ande
the said' lindesay askit his gudis to borghe' and freide to him And'
grantit and oblist him to the said' balye to content and pay to the said'
Dauid samekile as he mycht prewe awand' him within xv dais
befor thir witnes Will blinsel William moire Androw nachty seriand
and diuers' vthiris

Curia capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene
tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die mensis Januarij Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo nonogesimo primo

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem mariote chamer
div.p:
Willelmus abirdour Andreas murray senior Willelmus portar Johannes blak
murdaicus glenmaluyn murdaicus blak Dauid spens Willelmus philp
Jacobus andirson Andreas Watsone and Andreas philpson'
Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus chamer frater mariote chamer
latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus'us' overwrites 'a'. et sasitus'us' overwrites 'a'. ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Jacobi coli
son' ex australi et terram patricij adamson' ex boreali et communionem
viam regiam versus oriens extendentem ad lacum dicti burgi versus occi
dens Ac de quadam terra siue paruo crofto Jacente ex occidentali parte eiusdem
vici inter terras Johannis colison' tam ex australi quos boreali partibus
Et quod dicta mariota est vna legittima et propinquior heredum dicti quondam
fratris suj de dictis terris Et quod est legittime etatis et valent per annum
xiij s' et iiij d' et tantum valuerunt tempore pacis Et tenentur
in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
et nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis per duos menses ac
eocirca in defectu veri heredis suum Jus nomine prosequentis

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirsone senior et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu iiijor s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
quondam Roberti newisone ex australi et terram Andree Ranisone
ex boreali et terram dicti Willelmj versus oriens et communionem viam regiam
versus occidens ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo murray
Andrea philpsone et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Robertus blinsel et protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo Redditu septem s' sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in futy inter terram Willelmj harspare ex australi
et terram Johannis matland' ex boriali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne mvnk Willelmo
verty et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone nomine procuratorio
cappellanorum collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu x s' eiusdem
capellanis annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis fechat ex boreali et terram quondam Johannis
andirsone ex australi Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in terra tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne lammyntone thoma hatmakar
et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram alexander mar' et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo Redditu x s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid
prat ex australi et terram Eduardi top ex boreali ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia Testibus tanquam 3o die
huius processus testibus Duncano smyth Willelmo quelp et Andrea
nachty seriando

Eodem die thomas rolland ostendit Instrumentum sasine Sigillo
Andree Culan ballivi de predicte terre recuperacione prosecunt
per alexandrum mar Igitur solempniter protestatus fuit quod quicquid
Idem Alexander in premissis fecerat non cedat sibj in preiudicium

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholson'
procurator capellanorum collegij et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
x s' dictis capellanis annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Rob Richardi
Kyntor ex australi et terram capellanum altaris Sancti petri ex boreali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo
die huius processus Testibus Duncano smitht Willelmo quelp et Andrea
Nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator altaris
beatissime virginis marie et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu ij s'
sibj et dicto altari annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam Roberti
club Jacente in le grene ex occidentali parte aque inter terram
eiusdem quondam Roberti ex australi et terram quondam Alexandri Kintor ex
boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Andrea Williamson henrico lorne et phil
ippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus domini mathei nicholson' de terra vasta
Jacente Infra dictum burgum Johanni stevinson pertine vsque
propter debilitatem curie

Eodem die continuatur Judicia processuum Willelmi andirson Jacobi
vsque in feriam sextam quintam proxime sequentem propter debilitatem Curie

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirson Jacobi et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo redditu iiijor s' sibj annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis fechat ex
boreali et terram quondam Johannis andirson ex australi ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo cuminge
Andrea allanson' et Andrea nachty seriando

the samyn day philp Dunbrek grantit him to pay to Androw branche
xxx s' of Siluer this next friday or ellis to gif him pennywor
this for the samyn

The samyn day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to Duncan talyour to cum
befor thame to fulfill the deliuerance of the assis' anent half
ane vnicorne gevin to Allan litstar

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod cristina lilburne et
Katherina lilburne sunt legittime et propinquiores heredes quondam
Johannis lilburne fratris suj

the said' day the ballieis ordanit philp Dunbrek to content and
pay to thome menyeis or his procuratouris ane barrele of Salmond'
sufficient merchande gude within xv dais or ellis alsmekile siluer as j
barrel gewis

the samyn day the ballieis assignit to the chapellanis of
the college of Sanct nicholes' kirk Sex markis of ther fermes
and malys of thar myllis yerlie to be pait at the termes vsuale
Witsonday and mertymes for the haly blude mes' syngyne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
xiij die Januarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per A Willelmum andirson Jacobi de
ductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre pe
nitus vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum in le grene inter terram Johannis
fawsid' olim versus austrum et terram Andree mason' versus boriam
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus decim s' sibi a longo
tempore debito et non soluit vnde dictus Willelmus peciit a ballivis
secundum formam suj processus prorecedentis iuris et iusticie complementer
decreuit Tunc Curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dictus
Willelmus proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperavit
in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore
Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris curie pro Judicio datum fuit teste
Curia

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Willelmum andirson Jacobi deductis
de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre penitus
vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum in le grene inter terram altaris beati
Johannis evangeliste versus austrum et terram thome quhit versus boream
in defectu solucionis vnius' annuj Redditus septem s' sibj a longo
tempore debito et non soluit vnde dictus Willelmius Willelmus peciit a ballivis secundum
formam suj processus precedentis Juris et iusticie Complementer Tunc
Curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dictus Willelmus proprietatem
et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti
annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamson' Judicatoris curie
pro Judicio data fuit Teste Curia et cetera

the saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis this day
aucht dais to Wat atkin with his avne consent to bringe and schew
his fadir chartir befor thame In the court becaus' his modir allegit
scho was in coniunctfeftment of the lande liand' in the chakerraw and contenit
in the samyn chartir
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die Januarij anno quo supra

the samyn day the ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis to
Will meir to bringe befor thame the decret of sere Jhon' ruthirfurd
Robert blinsele and William Kintor quhilkis he allegis gevin betuix
him and William blinsell that thai may do Justice betuix thame

The samyn day the ballieis assignit monunday this day xv dais
to Anny baxtar to comper befor thame to ansuer to William portar
anent the clame of his lande quhilkis scho Inhabitis

Eodem die Richardus ruthirfurd' inuenit thomam Wode plegium
legalem quod Johannes Waus et vxor sua erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter
quam per viam iuris Et dictus Johannes inuenit Arthurum forbes de Reres
plegium legalem quod dictus Arthurus Richardus et Indempnis pro dicto Johanne
aliter quam per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur per ostensionem
manuum ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

The sa xviij day of Januar' the yer forsaid' Jonhne sanclar'
come borghe and dettour to Jhon' Wormet for William goldsmitht
for tua barrellis of Salmond' ful rede and suet sufficient merchand'
gude of the richtwis' bind' of Abirdene to be pait at mydsommir'
next to cum or within xv dais thareftir An be his hand' vphaldin
and the said' William oblist him be the fatht of his body to releif
and fre the saide Jhon' of the said' tua barrellis of Salmond'
befor Jhon' menyeis balye James Kennerty and Alexander scrogis

Curia balliuroum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die Januarij
anno quo supra

the saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis
to Willekin skippar of the feire to ansuer to the borghe strekit
vpon' him be Jhone of lammyntone for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of compt rekning and pament of xxxx skinnis

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the court
assignit monunday that next cumis to Eby Kintor the relict of
Androw atkin to bringe and scho hir documentis and writis of the richt
that scho has to the lande that scho now Inhabitis as scho will tyn'
and wyne

the saide day Eby atkin dissentyt to the saide day be hir
self and hir forspekar William blinsele ande protestit solemp
lie that the day assignit to hir be the aldirman ande
balyeis to schaw hir richt of hir coniunctfeftment that
scho has to the lande that scho Inhabitis

the saide day the aldirman and diuers' of the consale grantit
to Androu cas' ane forstallare or ane burges be the sicht
and consideracion of the aldirman and consale quhilk the said Androw wald
cheis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Januarij anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xv dais
to Jhone Westland' to preyf that he hes pait xvij s' to patrik
nicholsone baxtar quhilkis Some he tuk to preywe pait

The saide day Dauid steuarte oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to pay to sere mathow nicholsone In the name of the chap
lannis of the college of abirdene xiij s' and iiij d' aucht to tham
of annuell of the land' of vmquhill Androw rettreis that he
Inhabitis at the next cumin of William abirdour to this tone

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this next tuys
day to lindesay harrald' with his awne consent to mak gude
with sere Jhone ruthirfurde Jonhne menyeis Androw branche thomas
mar' and thomas fyf that Dauid menyes eldar was content
to tak ane barrele of Salmond' fra him sene the makinge
of the first Ak

the samyn day Arthour forbes of Reres In the name of Anny
vocat schew that he was to pas' and rais' ane breif of Inquest
of our Souerane lordis chapel to entir hir in ane lande perte
ning to hir liand' in the schipraw quharfor he solemptlie
protestit that the aldirman ballieis and officiaris handis suld' be clo
sit and nocht pas' with nay party to distrenye the said' landis for
nay annuell Rent vnto the tyme scho be enterit that scho
may derenye the pundis with perell law as efferis

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be the mast part of the
assis' that Willekin skippar of the feire sal mak pament in the
seland' to Jhon' lammyntone or his factouris of xxiiij noblis for his
serplar of skinnis that the said' Willekin hed' in Sellinge
the fraucht and vncostis beinge allouit tharintill siclik as vthir
gudis pont of that rays'

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis discriuit the copy of
ane Infeftment producit be Eby atkin to be gevin to Alexander
chamer of murchile forspekar to Wat atkin Ande assignit
monunday cum xv dais to the said' Walter to Excep agan
the said' Instrument

head.add: Androw litstar Jhon' thome Jhone litstar

div.p:
The saide day Jhone thomsone and Jhone litstar Sone and ayr to vm
quhile thomas litstar one that ane part Ande androw litstar one that vthir
part was oblist and suorne the gret aithe to stande at the deliuerance
and ordinance of thir personis vndir writin Alane litstar Jhone litstar Richerd'
litstar Alexander rede Jhone' moire and Dauid' anent the gudis contenit in ane
bill quhilkis eftir followis clamyt be the saide Jhone thomsone and Jhone
litstar that is to say ane leid' with the trubbis a stok fat of Estlande
burde ane vthir fate set in the erde iij new nettis ij secunde
nettis ij savis and the tidis to ber' tham ij stremgeouris a wringyn
yrne in a stok ane new spuchone a spout of aucht fute lange
made of Estlande ij clekis of yrne a tre that makis the fyer
with a fork of yrne the price xij d' a schuile schoide with yrne
ij wade dischis price xij d' ane Estlande burde knapaldis and
sperris with ale vthir and Sindry geir' belangand' to the bastar'
craft ij barronis and ane troys' pvnde quhilkis personis salbe
suorne and tak the saide mater to cum and begin it one thursday
that next cumis and giffurtht thar deliuerance than betuix this
and this day aucht dais within the blakfreris of Abirdene

The saide day it was statute and ordanit be the ballieis consale
and' communite that the aldirman beinge In office for the tyme
sal expone thar' commone gudis in the townis erandis to thar
profit ande vtilite Ande quhene thar commone gudis ar expendit
he sal mak his compt and deliuer to thame and warne thame that
thai be nocht superexpendit mair' than thar commone gudis extendis
to

Eodem die Alexander Symsone filius et heres quondam Dauid simsone burgensis
huius burgi elegit creauit fecit constituit et ordinauit cum expressis consensu et
assensu amicorum et consanguineorum propinquorum suorum prouidum virum Andream
Culane Juniore suum verum legittimum Curatum Irreuocabilem ad regendum manu
tenendum defendendum et gubernandum ipsum terras suos suas annuos Red
ditus piscarias bona sibi Jure hereditario et alias contingen' pro sua vtili
tate dummodo peruenerit ad etatem perfectam Testibus Johanne Culan preposito
thoma fyf Johanne menyeis duobus balliuorum magistro Waltero leslie
rectore de mennivir' Alexandro menyes Alexandro mar' Johanne colisone
Johanne brogane thoma leslie Jacobo leslie Andrea nachty philippo
Dunbrek duobus seriandorum Dominis Roberto leis et Johanne Stiruelinge
scriba curie ac notariis publicis Quicquid Andreas se fide media
obligauit ad regendum ipsum terras et bona sua pro suo comodo vt detet
Curat' fraude et dolo Semotis
